snippet: The United States on Friday prohibited investment in Crimea and slapped sanctions on 24 Ukrainians and Russians and several companies it determined were contributing to destabilizing Ukraine....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Prohibits Investment in Crimea Among Slew of Sanctions
headline.main: U.S. Prohibits Investment in Crimea Among Slew of Sanctions

lead_paragraph: The United States on Friday prohibited investment in Crimea and slapped sanctions on 24 Ukrainians and Russians and several companies it determined were contributing to destabilizing Ukraine.
